text: Va ʙa on mardume, ki ʙa notavoni aftoda ʙudand, sarqu ƣarʙi on sarzaminro, ki ʙarakat doda ʙudem, ʙa meros dodem va va'dai nekue, ki Parvardigori tu ʙa ʙani—Isroil doda ʙud, ʙa on saʙaʙ, ki saʙr namuda ʙudand, ʙa kamol rasid va har ciro Fir'avnu qavmas mesoxtand va qasrhoero, ki ʙarmeafrostand, vajron kardem
